title: Real face
description: The illustration has been made for the blog post about the research that heavy smartphone usage at a young age increases the rate of depression and suicide. The illustration outline the connection between a female teenage and their phone with the risks. Follow us on Twitter & Facebook & Instagram You're always welcome to visit our amazing Blog

user.name: DAN Gartman
user.bio: Illustrator. Rat owner. I'm here @fireart-d

title: Old Round Island Point Lighthouse.
description: Old Round Island Point Lighthouse is one of the most gorgeous places on earth. And these lighthouses are little jewels in the crown. Yes, there is nothing more beautiful than nature, but in certain instances, man does things to actually improve it. I give you exhibit.

user.name: febin_raj
user.bio: I am an Illustrator & designer @fireart-d Studio. Apart from my job, I love journeys and beautiful places.
